name: Jump or Die (BOC Dev)
description:
Super simple, super addictive! The sequel the fly or die that nobody asked for - HERE AT LAST!

Credits: I couldn't have made this game without the amazing assets provided by the following amazing artists! Go check them out and show them some love!
Music: https://svl.itch.io/rpg-music-pack-svl
Sprite: https://rvros.itch.io/animated-pixel-hero

Download from google play and let me know what you think!
